Package storage

Class DatabaseStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • storage.PersistentStorage
      • storage.DatabaseStorage
  • public class DatabaseStorage
extends PersistentStorage
    JDBC-based implementation of PersistentStorage that uses a MariaDB/MySQL database for storage.

      • initializeStorageMethod

        protected void initializeStorageMethod()
        Description copied from class: PersistentStorage
        Initialize whatever storage method is being used as the persistent layer. Usually a database connection.
        Specified by:
        initializeStorageMethod in class PersistentStorage

      • createUser

        public void createUser​(java.lang.String username,
                       java.lang.String password,
                       java.lang.String email,
                       UserPermission[] permissions)
        Description copied from class: PersistentStorage
        Create a new user. Note that this does not check if an user with the same username already exists; use PersistentStorage.checkUserWithUsernameExists(username) to avoid duplicating/overwriting existing users.
        Specified by:
        createUser in class PersistentStorage
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the user to create.
        password - The plaintext password of the user to create.
        email - The email of the user to create.
        permissions - An array of permissions that the user should have. Currently stored but not actually used (all users have all permissions right now).

      • validateUser

        public int validateUser​(java.lang.String username,
                        java.lang.String password)
        Description copied from class: PersistentStorage
        Check a user's credentials (used for logging in existing users).
        Specified by:
        validateUser in class PersistentStorage
        Parameters:
        username - The username that the user inputted.
        password - The plaintext password that the user inputted.
        Returns:
        true if valid credentials, false if not.

      • checkUserWithUsernameExists

        public boolean checkUserWithUsernameExists​(java.lang.String username)
        Description copied from class: PersistentStorage
        Check whether a user with a given username already exists (used for the creation of new users).
        Specified by:
        checkUserWithUsernameExists in class PersistentStorage
        Parameters:
        username - The username to check.
        Returns:
        true if the user already exists, false if not.

      • createTestFile

        private int createTestFile​(int user_id,
                           byte[] test_file,
                           java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String file_type,
                           int number_of_pages)

      • createTest

        public int createTest​(int user_id,
                      java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String description,
                      byte[] blank_test_file,
                      java.lang.String blank_test_file_name,
                      java.lang.String blank_test_file_type,
                      byte[] answers_test_file,
                      java.lang.String answers_test_file_name,
                      java.lang.String answers_test_file_type)
        Description copied from class: PersistentStorage
        Create a new test for a given user.
        Specified by:
        createTest in class PersistentStorage
        Parameters:
        user_id - The user id of the user creating the test (they will become the 'owner' of the test).
        name - The human-readable title (name) of the test.
        description - The human-readable plaintext textual description of the test.
        blank_test_file - The raw PDF data of the test, without answers written in.
        blank_test_file_name - The file name of the PDF of the test without answers.
        blank_test_file_type - The type (a string like 'pdf' or 'docx') of the blank test file. Will always be 'pdf' for now.
        answers_test_file - The raw PDF data of the test, with answers written in.
        answers_test_file_name - The file name of the PDF of the test with answers.
        answers_test_file_type - The type (a string like 'pdf' or 'docx') of the test file with answers. Will always be 'pdf' for now.
        Returns:
        The id of the test that was created.

      • getTestsByUser

        public Test[] getTestsByUser​(int user_id)
        Description copied from class: PersistentStorage
        Retrieve all tests created/owned by a specific user.
        Specified by:
        getTestsByUser in class PersistentStorage
        Parameters:
        user_id - The id of the user for whom you want to retrieve tests.
        Returns:
        An array of all tests created/owned by the user with id user_id.

      • getTestById

        public Test getTestById​(int user_id,
                        int test_id)
        Description copied from class: PersistentStorage
        Retrieve a test by user id and test_id.
        Specified by:
        getTestById in class PersistentStorage
        Parameters:
        user_id - The user id of the user who owns (created) the test. Providing this prevents users from maliciously or accidentally accessing each other's tests.
        test_id - The test id of the test you are trying to retrieve.
        Returns:
        A Test object of the requested test. Note that changing this returned Test object has no effect on the actual persistently stored data. Returns null if the test couldn't be found or was owned by another user.

      • getTestFileById

        public TestFile getTestFileById​(int user_id,
                                int test_file_id)
        Description copied from class: PersistentStorage
        Retrieve a test file (a previously-uploaded PDF containing test questions and possibly example answers as well) by its id.
        Specified by:
        getTestFileById in class PersistentStorage
        Parameters:
        user_id - The id of the user who uploaded the file.
        test_file_id - The id of the test file.
        Returns:
        A TestFile object of the requested test file. Note that changing this returned TestFile object has no effect on the actual persistently stored data. Returns null if not found or owned by another user.

      • getNumberOfPagesInTestFileById

        public int getNumberOfPagesInTestFileById​(int user_id,
                                          int test_file_id)
        Description copied from class: PersistentStorage
        Get the number of pages in a test file (a previously-uploaded PDF containing test questions and possibly example answers as well) by its id.
        Specified by:
        getNumberOfPagesInTestFileById in class PersistentStorage
        Parameters:
        user_id - The user id of the user who uploaded the file.
        test_file_id - The id of the test file.
        Returns:
        The number of pages in the test file as an integer. Returns -1 if not found or owned by another user.

      • createQuestions

        public void createQuestions​(int test_file_id,
                            int user_id,
                            TestQuestion[] questions)
        Description copied from class: PersistentStorage
        Creates new test questions.
        Specified by:
        createQuestions in class PersistentStorage
        Parameters:
        test_file_id - All test questions must be attached to a specific test file. This specifies the id of the test file. Normally, test questions will be associated with a test file that has example solutions written in.
        user_id - The user id of the user who created the questions.
        questions - An array of storage.TestQuestion objects representing the test questions to be added to the persistent storage.

      • getQuestionsByTestFileId

        public TestQuestion[] getQuestionsByTestFileId​(int user_id,
                                               int test_file_id)
        Description copied from class: PersistentStorage
        Retrieve all questions associated with a specific test file.
        Specified by:
        getQuestionsByTestFileId in class PersistentStorage
        Parameters:
        user_id - The user id of the user who uploaded the test file.
        test_file_id - The id of the test file that the questions are attached to.
        Returns:
        An array of all test questions by user user_id attached to the test file test_file_id. Returns an empty array if no questions are found.

      • getQuestionsByTestId

        public TestQuestion[] getQuestionsByTestId​(int user_id,
                                           int test_id)
        Description copied from class: PersistentStorage
        Retrieve all questions associated with a specific test. This will call getQuestionsByTestFileId for the test file of the specified test that has example solutions written in (i. e. it does not query for questions attached to the blank test file).
        Specified by:
        getQuestionsByTestId in class PersistentStorage
        Parameters:
        user_id - The id of the user who created the questions being queried.
        test_id - The id of the test that the questions are attached to.
        Returns:
        An array of all test questions matching the criteria. Returns an empty array if none are found.

      • deleteTestFileById

        private void deleteTestFileById​(int user_id,
                                int test_file_id)

      • deleteTestById

        public void deleteTestById​(int user_id,
                           int test_id)
        Description copied from class: PersistentStorage
        Delete a test and all associated test files and questions.
        Specified by:
        deleteTestById in class PersistentStorage
        Parameters:
        user_id - The user id of the user who owns the test.
        test_id - The id of the test to delete.

      • createStudentAnswerFile

        public void createStudentAnswerFile​(int user_id,
                                    int test_id,
                                    byte[] student_answer_file,
                                    java.lang.String student_answer_file_name,
                                    java.lang.String student_answer_file_type,
                                    int number_of_pages)
        Description copied from class: PersistentStorage
        Create a student answer file (a scanned PDF file containing students' responses to test questions).
        Specified by:
        createStudentAnswerFile in class PersistentStorage
        Parameters:
        user_id - The user id of the user uploading the PDF.
        test_id - The test id of the test that the answers correspond to.
        student_answer_file - The raw, binary PDF data of the uploaded file.
        student_answer_file_name - The name of the uploaded file.
        student_answer_file_type - The type of the uploaded file. For now, this is always "pdf".
        number_of_pages - The number of pages in the uploaded file.

      • getStudentAnswerFilesByTestId

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> getStudentAnswerFilesByTestId​(int user_id,
                                                                                             int test_id)
        Description copied from class: PersistentStorage
        Retrieve all student answer files associated with a particular test.
        Specified by:
        getStudentAnswerFilesByTestId in class PersistentStorage
        Parameters:
        user_id - The user id of the user who owns the test.
        test_id - The test id of the test that the student answers correspond to.
        Returns:
        A Map<Integer, String> where the keys are student answer files' ids and the values are the student answer files' names.

      • getStudentAnswerFileById

        public byte[] getStudentAnswerFileById​(int user_id,
                                       int student_answer_file_id)
        Description copied from class: PersistentStorage
        Retrieve the contents of a student answer file by its id.
        Specified by:
        getStudentAnswerFileById in class PersistentStorage
        Parameters:
        user_id - The user id of the user who uploaded the file.
        student_answer_file_id - The id of the student answer file being requested.
        Returns:
        The raw, binary PDF data of the student answer file.
